dcterms:creator: Alexey Dosovitskiy
German Ros
Felipe Codevilla
Antonio Lopez
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: CARLA is a high-fidelity open-source simulator that provides a dynamic environment for the development, testing, and validation of Autonomous Driving (AD) systems. It includes pre-defined maps and various sensor models to gather data from the environment.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:description: ScenarioRunner is a module of CARLA that allows traffic scenario definition and execution for the CARLA simulator. It enables the specification of diverse and complex scenarios based on predefined car behaviors.
dcterms:title: ScenarioRunner

dcterms:creator: Simone Fratini
Patrick Fleith
Nicola Policella
Alberto Griggio
Stefano Tonetta
Srajan Goyal
Thi Thieu Hoa Le
Jacob Kimblad
Chun Tian
Konstantinos Kapellos
Christos Tranoris
Quirien Wijnands
dcterms:description: VIVAS is a framework developed for system-level simulation-based verification and validation of autonomous systems, focusing on the integration of AI components and formal methods to generate scenarios and verify simulation executions.
dcterms:title: VIVAS

dcterms:creator: Daniel J. Fremont
Edward Kim
Tommaso Dreossi
Shromona Ghosh
Xiangyu Yue
Alberto L. Sangiovanni-Vincentelli
Sanjit A. Seshia
dcterms:description: Scenic is a probabilistic programming language designed for scenario generation, allowing the specification of spatial and temporal relationships between objects in a scenario and enabling automatic test case generation through sampling.
dcterms:title: Scenic

dcterms:creator: Marco Bozzano
Riccardo Bussola
Marco Cristoforetti
Srajan Goyal
Martin Jonáš
Konstantinos Kapellos
Andrea Micheli
Davide Soldà
Stefano Tonetta
Christos Tranoris
Alessandro Valentini
dcterms:description: RobDT is a framework that enhances digital twin technology for space exploration robotic assets, integrating AI components for improved performance and reliability.
dcterms:title: ROBDT
